name: Marble Race
description: Race through colorful levels filled with obstacles and monsters and claim the best time. Challenge your friends in a 4-way battle arena. Unlock secrets and even build your own levels. A tribute to "Hamsterball" and "Marble Madness".
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/8.1/10 x86/x64 Processor: Intel Pentium D 830 (2* 3000) or equivalent / AMD Athlon 64 4000+ (2600) or equivalent Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 7600 GS (256 MB) / Radeon HD 2400 PRO (256 MB) DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
